name: CL_LNK_CONTACT
description: This table contains the overtime single items in the Linked Order Groups (LNK) master file.

columns.name: LNK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the linked order group.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) of the linked order group contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_NUM
columns.description: The contact number in the linked order group record.

columns.name: CNCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The contact type category ID for the linked order group record, which describes the action taken on the linked order group.

columns.name: INST_OF_ENTRY_TM
columns.description: The last instant this linked order group record was edited.
